Class Road

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaces.Road
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OneWayRoad, TwoWayRoad

    public abstract class Road
extends java.lang.Object

      Add the Road object to its two intersections.

      Adds the Vehicle object car into the specified lane at time timeAdded.
      abstract boolean allowsEnter(IntersectionInterface Is)
      Returns true if vehicles can enter from intersection Is, otherwise returns false.
      abstract int availableVehicle(double time, IntersectionInterface Is)
      Returns the lane number of an available vehicle if one exits.
      abstract int canEnter(IntersectionInterface Is)
      If there is room in the road object, return the lane number that can be entered.
      int getID()
      Returns the ID of the road.
      double getLength()
      Returns the length of the road.
      abstract int getNumLanes(IntersectionInterface Is)
      Returns the number of lanes feeding into intersection Is
      abstract void notify(IntersectionInterface Is, double time)
      If a car is available at the specified time to enter the intersection Is, an EnterIs event is enqueued.
      abstract void notifyAll(IntersectionInterface Is, double time)
      For each lane in the road, checks whether a vehicle is available at the passed time to enter intersection Is.
      abstract IntersectionInterface otherIntersection(IntersectionInterface Is)
      Returns intersection of the road object not equal to Is.

      Removes the Vehicle object car from the lane whose index is passed.

      • availableVehicle

        public abstract int availableVehicle(double time,
                   IntersectionInterface Is)
        Returns the lane number of an available vehicle if one exits. A vehicle is available if it arrived at the end of the road by the time specified and its mode matches that of Intersection Is
        Parameters:
        time -
        Is -
        Returns:

      • canEnter

        public abstract int canEnter(IntersectionInterface Is)
        If there is room in the road object, return the lane number that can be entered. Otherwise, return -1.
        Parameters:
        Is -
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • allowsEnter

        public abstract boolean allowsEnter(IntersectionInterface Is)
        Returns true if vehicles can enter from intersection Is, otherwise returns false. This is always true for two way roads.
        Parameters:
        Is -
        Returns:

      • notifyAll

        public abstract void notifyAll(IntersectionInterface Is,
             double time)
        For each lane in the road, checks whether a vehicle is available at the passed time to enter intersection Is. If yes, an EnterIs even is enqueued. This is called after the intersection Is changes its mode.
        Parameters:
        Is -
        time -

      • notify

        public abstract void notify(IntersectionInterface Is,
          double time)
        If a car is available at the specified time to enter the intersection Is, an EnterIs event is enqueued. Called after a vehicle (that entered from this road) exists the intersection Is.
        Parameters:
        Is -
        time -
